name: 多款Apple产品拒绝服务漏洞（CNVD-2025-22688）
product: ["Apple macOS Sonoma <14.8", "Apple iOS <18.7", "Apple iPadOS <18.7", "Apple Computer, Inc. MacOS <26"]
description: Apple macOS Sequoia等都是美国苹果（Apple）公司的一款操作系统。多款Apple产品存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于验证不足，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致拒绝服务。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125109
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125110
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125111
https://support.apple.com/en-us/125112
patch: 多款Apple产品拒绝服务漏洞（CNVD-2025-22688）的补丁
